statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY M1.SortOrder, M2.SortOrder, AA.ID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.ProductID , AA.ImageType , AA.ImageGroup , AA.ImageID , BB.Name , BB.Url , null as Path , BB.Width , BB.Height
, M1.Name as ImageTypeName , M2.Name as ImageGroupName
FROM dbo.TProductImage AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TImage BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ImageID = BB.ID LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ImageType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'ImageType' LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ImageGroup = M2.Code AND M2.ParentCode = 'ImageGroup' WHERE AA.ProductID = #ProductID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.* , BB.Name , BB.Url , BB.Width , BB.Height
FROM dbo.TProductImage AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TImage BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ImageID = BB.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TProductImage ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, ProductID, ImageType, ImageGroup, ImageID ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #ProductID#, #ImageType#, #ImageGroup#, #ImageID# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TProductImage SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, ProductID = #ProductID# , ImageType = #ImageType# , ImageGroup = #ImageGroup# , ImageID = #ImageID# WHERE ID = #ID#
